text:
If you receive the error gzip.BadGzipFile: Not a gzipped file (b'\n\n'), this is because you have specified the wrong URL to the FHV dataset. Make sure to use https://github.com/DataTalksClub/nyc-tlc-data/releases/download/fhv/{dataset_file}.csv.gz
Emphasising the ‘/releases/download’ part of the URL.
question: GCS Bucket - Fix Error when importing FHV data to GCS
